title: Police seek details of people from Northeast, Darjeeling
selftext: Is this level of profiling even legal?
comments:
So if someone registers, Delhi police will guarantee their security?

This is a feeble attempt to profile people in the name of security. This will be used as an excuse by Delhi police if there are any NE related incidents in Delhi.
Bengal ho gaya, abki baar Northeast #IllegalChinese /s
